titles.title: Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2023
Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2023
Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2023

To authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2023 for intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government, the Community Management Account, and the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability System, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select).
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Intelligence. H. Rept. 117-546.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 392.

bill.summary:
Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2023
This bill authorizes FY2023 appropriations for intelligence-related activities and addresses related issues.
